@ZA_H wrote:

You have to change the “playerXP[i] = 1155;”
To match level 99 Hp so change the to 14000000

“playerXP[i] = 14000000;”

item.title: A 10 hp problem
item.dc:creator: @Username Username
item.description:
@Username wrote:

On my server players logout with 99/99 hp and log back in with 10/99 I’ve changed this for (int i = 0; i < playerLevel.length; i++) { // Setting Levels if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 10; playerXP[i] = 1155; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } } to this for (int i = 0; i < playerLevel.length; i++) { // Setting Levels if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 99; playerXP[i] = 1155; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } }

Yet they still log in with 10/maxhp. What is the fix?

Read full topic
